item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are the perfect entertainment: no commercials, no batteries, hours of enjoyment for each dollar spent. What I wonder is why everybody doesn't carry a book around for those inevitable dead spots in life." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Sometimes being a bitch is all a woman's got to hold on to." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you liked being a teenager, there's something really wrong with you." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Speaking personally, you can have my gun, but you'll take my book when you pry my cold, dead fingers off of the binding." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I think that we're all mentally ill. Those of us outside the asylums only hide it a little better - and maybe not all that much better after all." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Nobody likes a clown at midnight" -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Writing is not life, but I think that sometimes it can be a way back to life." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lori add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Lori add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lori add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Lori add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Lori add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lori add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lori add a quote by Joyce Meyer
item.description: "You can suffer the pain of change or suffer remaining the way you are." -- Joyce Meyer

item.title: Lori add a quote by Charles Lamb
item.description: "Of all sound of all bells... most solemn and touching is the peal which rings out the Old Year." -- Charles Lamb

item.title: Lori add a quote by Eleanor Hodgman Porter
item.description: "Be glad. Be good. Be brave." -- Eleanor Hodgman Porter
